 2012-10152012-08-20CH,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectEx Gratia Payments - Canadian Forces
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Canadian Heritage to make a one-time ex gratia payment of $50,000 to the Mounted Police Foundation, also known as the RCMP Foundation, on behalf of Their Royal Highnesses the Prince of Wales and the Duchess of Cornwall.
AttachmentsAttachment
